lead_paragraph: India and Indonesia both held Independence Day celebrations last week. India, which gained independence from British colonial rule on Aug. 15, 1947, marked the day with cultural and military parades, colorful festivals and political speeches. Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the nation, saying that India would not bow to extremism and calling for young people to turn away from violence.

headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia
